Summary: wlking dog before bed saw light changing color in the sky. went in woke my daughter and asked her what colr it was and we watched for a little while then it moved west and was beyond line of sight
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in saratoga
There were no other sightings in saratoga on or around March 26th 2013
divs: Sighting Detailswent outside to walk dog about 11pm est. saw light changing color in s, sw sky watched for a few minutes. went in to get phone to take video. it didnt pick it up it was to far away. so i went in to get the video camera taped for a while but the auto focus wasnt picking it up very well. went inside woke my daughter up brought her to the window showed it to her asked her what color it was she said red blue white. so we went outside so she could get a better look, watched it for 10 minutes or so it had moves further south and west. i put her back to bed and watched it through the window. went to bed about 11:40 and it had just moved out of line of sight westerly behind trees.
